statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{6 \, x^{3} - 19 \, x^{2} + 28 \, x + 5 , -2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 1 , 12 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x^{2} + 27 \, x + 9 , -6 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x - 3 , 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
